name: Desert Burner
overview: You are the leader of a small but highly organised band of freedom fighters dedicated to overthrowing the oppressive government forces. You must undertake the delivery of highly sensitive weapon design plans to another underground group. The construction of a powerful road bike is now complete and has been entrusted to you for this important mission. Code named Desert Burner it is capable of speeds in excess of 200 mph and is fitted with fast action front mounted cannons. It will be a long journey... you will even have to travel at night. Have you got what it takes to ride the Desert Burner?
